plot: A man who plays lottery for years suddenly wins 4 million euros, despite his previous lack of success. However, a winning ticket somehow finds its way to the hands of local pub's owners. ...
title: Potera za Srec(k)om
plot_es: A man who plays lottery for years suddenly wins 4 million euros, despite his previous lack of success. However, a winning ticket somehow finds its way to the hands of local pub's owners. ...
